summary: Adds in a Dunmer merchant who has slightly less-then-legal goods
descriptionHtml:
[heading][b][color=red]The Shady Dunmer Merchant[/color][/b][/heading]

Just a quick mod I did for practice and thought others would enjoy. This adds in a Dunmer merchant in Begger's Row in Rfiten who sells rather, er, less-then-legal items such as Daedra and Human Hearts, Human Flesh, some armor and rings, bones, poisons, lockpicks, poisons, skooma, several ingredients and at higher levels, ebony, Daedric and Stalhrim weapons.

Unfortunately, he doesn't have any unique dialogue (despite me trying). He's always open for buisness (which is what I didn't want, but meh) and he has 750 gold for trading.

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Installation[/b]=====[/color]

Download and drop the file into your data folder. Place meshes into the appropriately named folders.
Or just use the NMM.
To uninstall, just remove the file.

[color=darkorange]====[b]Compatibility[/b]====[/color]

[i]Compatible:[/i]
Everything and anything, there is no scriptsw and he is a simple NPC.

[i]Incompatible:[/i]
None that I can think of. Incompatible NPCS makes a few more NPCs occupy Begger's Row, but it's not impossible to wander around there.

[color=darkorange]=====[b]Permissions and Credits[/b]=====[/color]
This mod is not to be uploaded anywhere but the Skyrim Nexus. Please report to me if you see this anywhere else.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating a great game and letting us fiddle with it.

[color=red]Thanks for reading and check my page for more mods![/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/7065334/?tb=mods&pUp=1 ] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2dryws3.png[/IMG][/url]
author: TaeRai
